statements: SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_type='expense' ORDER BY date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, category, department FROM financial_data WHERE amount >= 1000
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT id, transaction_type, category FROM financial_data ORDER BY transaction_type, amount ASC
SELECT id, date, amount FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_type='Expense' AND category='Food'
SELECT department, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_data GROUP BY department ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT department, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_type='Income' GROUP BY department ORDER BY avg_amount
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM financial_data WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT opportunity_id, opportunity_description, savings_amount FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE savings_amount > 1000 ORDER BY savings_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT recommendation FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE opportunity_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE category = 'Food' ORDER BY amount DESC;

SELECT transaction_id, DATE_FORMAT(transaction_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date, category FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 AND category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing') ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;

SELECT opportunity_id, CONCAT('Opportunity: ', opportunity_description) AS opportunity_info, ROUND(savings_amount * 0.1, 2) AS projected_savings FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE recommendation LIKE '%urgent%' ORDER BY opportunity_id DESC;
SELECT opportunity_id, opportunity_description, savings_amount FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE savings_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY savings_amount ASC, opportunity_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, amount FROM financial_data WHERE category='Food';
SELECT transaction_date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS transaction_count FROM financial_data GROUP BY category;
SELECT * FROM cost_saving_opportunities ORDER BY potential_savings DESC;
SELECT id, transaction_date, category, amount FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT opportunity_name, potential_savings, analysis_date FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE potential_savings >= 5000 ORDER BY potential_savings DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT project_name, budget, allocation_date FROM resource_allocation WHERE budget BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY project_name LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, transaction_date, category, amount FROM financial_data WHERE category = 'Investments' ORDER BY amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT opportunity_name, potential_savings, analysis_date FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT id, category, description FROM financial_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT amount, category FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT id, date, amount FROM financial_data WHERE category='Investment';
SELECT * FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE date_identified > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, date, amount, category, description FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 10000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT opportunity_id, opportunity_description, amount_saved FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE amount_saved < 5000 ORDER BY amount_saved ASC;
SELECT project_id, resource_name, allocation_amount FROM resource_allocation WHERE allocation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY project_id ASC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_description FROM optimization_strategies WHERE implementation_cost > 2000 ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_data JOIN resource_allocation ON financial_data.id = resource_allocation.id WHERE category = 'Marketing';
SELECT * FROM financial_data;
SELECT opportunity_name, description, potential_savings FROM cost_saving_opportunities;
SELECT project_name, allocated_amount FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_type='Human Resource';
SELECT report_name, report_type, report_date FROM financial_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, estimated_performance_gain FROM optimization_strategies WHERE estimated_performance_gain > 1000;
SELECT * FROM financial_data WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM cost_saving_opportunities WHERE potential_savings < 5000;
SELECT category, amount FROM financial_data WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM resource_allocation WHERE resource_type = 'Human Resource' ORDER BY project_name ASC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_type = 'Monthly' AND report_date >= '2021-01-01';
